We all want the same thing.
Break away the differences between what I just described:...
...language, politics, the way people dress, their history.
We all want the same thing.
We wanna be respected as employees.
We wanna be appreciated as customers.
We wanna feel dignified in the workplace and who we are as people.
And we wanna go into a store,...
...and for that brief moment of whether we're buying a cup of coffee or whatever it might be,...
...we want some value for our money.
